meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is piled high on the head in a conical shape resembling a beehive.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beehived hairstyle to the party, looking elegant and stylish.
meanings.sent2: Her beehived hair caught everyone's attention as she walked into the room.
meanings.sent3: The beehived hairdo made her look taller than she actually was.
meanings.sent4: Her beehived hair was like a tower of curls atop her head.
meanings.sent5: The beehived hairstyle made her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To arrange or style hair in a beehive shape.
meanings.sent1: She beehived her hair for the special occasion, creating a stunning look.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she carefully beehived her hair before going to work.
meanings.sent3: He beehived his hair so well that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: She beehived her hair with precision, achieving the perfect shape.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist beehived her hair expertly, making it stay in place all day.
